page.title: 08New Housing, Hollington
page.content: I live in Norfolk Drive in the {Tilekiln Estate,}near the Castleham Industrial Estate.It is a new estate, and is planned in an interesting way. There are terraced, semi-detatched, detatched,houses and bungalows.My house is semi-detatched.It has three storeys. It's a nice area to live in because it has quite a lot of{play {parks,}and not many roads just foot paths. The only local shop is Tesco Superstore, which everyone uses. The bunglows are made of bricks and cement, they have a balcony.The houses are made from the same material but they have a garden. Some houses are painted attractive colours; trees and shrubs are planted in many places. We nickname one playpark the 'Sandpit' because it was a sandpit about two years ago, and another the 'Rocket' because it has 2 slides like rockets.
